title: Eastern Equine Encephalitis Treated With Intravenous Immunoglobulins.
abstract: We report the case of a 68-year-old man from southeastern Massachusetts presenting with encephalitis due to eastern equine encephalitis (EEE) virus. Despite the high morbidity and mortality rate of EEE, the patient made a near complete recovery in the setting of receiving early intravenous immunoglobulins.

authors.name: Shibani S Mukerji
